title: Which hackaton participant are you?
description: Find out how you can power your team in to the hackathon

questions.title: When you're faced with a problem, what is your typical approach?

answers.answer: Break the problem down into smaller parts and come up with a step-by-step solution
Brainstorm a variety of creative solutions and evaluate which one is the best fit
Analyze the problem from a business perspective and identify potential solutions that align with the company's goals
Use your specialized knowledge or skills to identify the root cause of the problem and come up with a solution

questions.title: How do you approach learning new skills?

answers.answer: I prefer to learn by doing and solving problems
I prefer to learn through experimentation and creativity
I prefer to learn through mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals
I prefer to learn through specialized training or courses that focus on a specific area
Solving complex technical problems and creating something new
Bringing a unique creative vision to life
Building a successful business and achieving financial success
Applying your specialized knowledge and skills to make a meaningful impact

results.title: The Developer
results.description: You're someone who enjoys coding and you have a strong technical background. You may be well-suited to take on the role of the Developer in a hackathon team. You'll be responsible for creating and testing new software solutions, and you may prefer to focus on the technical aspects of the project rather than the design or business elements.
results.me_description: I am someone who enjoys coding and I have a strong technical background. I may be well-suited to take on the role of the Developer in a hackathon team. I'll be responsible for creating and testing new software solutions, and I may prefer to focus on the technical aspects of the project rather than the design or business elements.

results.title: The Designer
results.description: You're a creative and outgoing individual with experience in graphic design or user experience. The role of the Designer may be a good fit for you. You'll be responsible for creating the visual and user interface elements of the project, and you'll have the opportunity to bring your unique sense of style and creativity to the table.

I'll be responsible for creating the visual and user interface elements of the project, and I'll have the opportunity to bring my unique sense of style and creativity to the table.

results.title: The Entrepreneur
results.description: You're someone who is passionate about business development and has experience in startups or marketing. The Entrepreneur role may be a good fit for you. You'll be focused on finding ways to turn the project into a viable product or service, and you'll be responsible for developing a marketing strategy and identifying potential customers.

results.title: The Expert
results.description: You have specialized knowledge or skills in a particular area, such as subject matter expertise or experience with a specific technology or tool. The Expert role may be a good fit for you. You'll be brought onto the team specifically to help solve a particular problem or challenge, and your expertise will be invaluable in helping the team develop a successful project.
